name: The Island - Castaway HD
description:
The immersive free-to-play version, The Island Castaway: Lost World®, is already live! Don't miss out!

Intense challenges await you in The Island - Castaway HD, an extremely addictive simulation game. You are one of the lucky few to escape a sinking ocean liner. Stranded on an island, you will have to learn to fish and hunt for wild boars, catch snakes and find rare plants. But it’s not all about staying alive. Explore the enigmatic island to find clues, solve over 200 diverse quests and decrypt ancient writings. Solving these mysteries could be your only chance to get back home! Dive into this riveting adventure today!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!

● 12 Absorbing locations
● 14 Unique and fascinating characters
● Over 200 quests to solve
● Huge, perplexing island to investigate
● Plot that's full of twists and turns
● Game Center Support
____________________________

Game available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Dutch, Swedish
